pages.text: The $(item)Concentrator$() is a simple matter manipulating apparatus.$(br) It uses two reagents, from which one (in the center of the block) will be influenced by the other (rotating around the center).$(br)$(marked)If the influencing is successful, the reagents will not be consumed or distorted$(). Unsuccessful influencing rites leave $(item)Chaotic Matter$() and consume the influencing reagent.

The process will, as said, influence one item with another. $(br)The item that is influenced will override one of its traits, like the physical state it presents, and will get the trait of the item that influences instead. $(br)One may want to watch the process, as in case of a successful process the essence influenced will still be influenced, which can ruin the results if it is in this state for too long.
